Reason: The configuration option 'concurrent_materialized_view_writes' in the Cassandra software project is performance-sensitive because changing its value can significantly impact system performance. When set to a high value, it can lead to increased write operations on materialized views, potentially causing higher memory consumption and longer execution times. Conversely, setting it to a low value may reduce the workload on the system, improving performance. Therefore, any change in this configuration can have a noticeable effect on system performance.
